microcopy.text: The security of the Compound protocol is our highest priority; our development team, alongside third-party auditors and consultants, has invested considerable effort to create a protocol that we believe is safe and dependable.
microcopy.purpose: Establish trust and explain security commitment

microcopy.text: We believe that size, visibility, and time are the true test for the security of a smart contract; please exercise caution, and make your own determination of security and suitability.
microcopy.purpose: Provide realistic expectations about smart contract security

microcopy.text: Compound III is now live, you're currently viewing Compound v2 documentation.
microcopy.purpose: Inform users about version status and provide migration path

microcopy.text: The Compound protocol is based on the Compound Whitepaper (2019); the codebase is open-source, and maintained by the community.
microcopy.purpose: Establish protocol origins and community ownership

microcopy.text: The app.compound.finance interface is open-source, and maintained by the community.

Please join the #development room in the Compound community Discord server; Compound Labs and members of the community look forward to helping you build an application on top of Compound. Your questions help us improve, so please don't hesitate to ask if you can't find what you are looking for here.
microcopy.purpose: Encourage community engagement and provide support resources

components.notable: Identical to previous screen; maintains visual consistency

components.description: Two-line display showing zero borrowing and zero collateral across single market
components.notable: Mirrors the data layout of liquidity page but with all zero values, indicating no user activity

components.description: Subtle particle/line animations scattered across dark background
components.notable: Consistent with first screen; creates cohesive visual identity

design.visualHierarchy: Extreme vertical centering with large headline metrics taking up most visual real estate. Minimal supporting elements.
innovativeElements: Reuses metric display pattern from liquidity page for empty state messaging
Shows zero states in same visual language as active data

flow.userIntent: View account-specific borrowing and collateral status (currently empty/zero)
flow.informationArchitecture: Centered empty state with metric template. No market cards or additional data present.
frictionPoints: Lack of guidance on next steps for user with zero positions
No obvious CTA encouraging user to create their first position

copy.headline: $0 of borrowing backed by $0 of collateral across 1 markets
